data.name: XConsolidationDescriptor
desc: provides access to the settings of a consolidation descriptor.

methods.name: getFunction
desc: returns the function by which the ranges are consolidated.

methods.name: getInsertLinks
desc: returns, whether links to the original data are inserted in the output area or not.

methods.name: getSources
desc: returns the cell ranges which are consolidated.

methods.name: getStartOutputPosition
desc: returns the position of the top left cell of the cell range where the consolidated data are copied.

methods.name: getUseColumnHeaders
desc: returns, whether column headers from the cell ranges are used to find matching data or not.

methods.name: getUseRowHeaders
desc: returns, whether row headers from the cell ranges are used to find matching data or not.

methods.name: setFunction
desc: sets the function by which the ranges are consolidated.

methods.name: setInsertLinks
desc: specifies if links to the original data are inserted in the output area.

methods.name: setSources
desc: sets the cell ranges which are consolidated.

methods.name: setStartOutputPosition
desc: sets the position of the top left cell of the cell range where the consolidated data are copied.

methods.name: setUseColumnHeaders
desc: specifies if column headers from the cell ranges are used to find matching data.

methods.name: setUseRowHeaders
desc: specifies if row headers from the cell ranges are used to find matching data.
